thread.section_title: Carid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Carid | www.carid.com
thread.title: Clancey;44

author: Clancey;44
title: Clancey;44
text: I looked on line for a power steering cooler for my 2001 Ford Sport Trac and a lot of the places was charging a very high price so I happened to thinks of the Carid because I have bought things form them before and i found one for like 1/4 of the price of everyone else's is and it was the whole kit with hose and radiator ties and hose clamps and all fixtures needed to install the cooler I was very happy that the cooler was so well made and came with all the parts needed to install the cooler I would very much buy from them again the cooler was easy to find on there web site and came to my house in less than a week The Carid gets a 5 star rating in my book and I would tell anyone to buy from this place with out any worries of what you are going to receive I'm so happy I remembered this web site got what I needed at a very fair price Thank You The Carid for being there when I needed you Wayne
